casebody.data: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Gerry G. ZOBRIST. No. D-2862. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 7, 2015. Gerry G. Zobrist, of Las Vegas, Nevada, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
